trclib

Class TrcDigitalInputTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • trclib.TrcTrigger
      • trclib.TrcDigitalInputTrigger

  • public class TrcDigitalInputTrigger
extends TrcTrigger
    This class implements a trigger for a digital input device. A digital input trigger consists of a digital input device. It monitors the device state and calls the notification handler if the state changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TrcDigitalInputTrigger.TriggerHandler
      This interface contains the method for the trigger event handler.
      static class  TrcDigitalInputTrigger.TriggerMode
      This enum type specifies the digital trigger mode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrcDigitalInputTrigger

        public TrcDigitalInputTrigger(java.lang.String instanceName,
                              TrcDigitalInput digitalInput,
                              TrcDigitalInputTrigger.TriggerHandler eventHandler)
        Constructor: Create an instance of the object.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - specifies the instance name.
        digitalInput - specifies the digital input device.
        eventHandler - specifies the object that will be called to handle the digital input device state change.

      • TrcDigitalInputTrigger

        public TrcDigitalInputTrigger(java.lang.String instanceName,
                              TrcDigitalInput digitalInput,
                              TrcEvent triggerEvent,
                              TrcDigitalInputTrigger.TriggerMode triggerMode)
        Constructor: Create an instance of the object.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - specifies the instance name.
        digitalInput - specifies the digital input device.
        triggerEvent - specifies the event to signal when the digital input device state change.
        triggerMode - specifies the event will be signaled on active trigger, inactive trigger or both.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        This method enables/disables the task that monitors the device state.
        Overrides:
        setEnabled in class TrcTrigger
        Parameters:
        enabled - specifies true to enable the task, false to disable.
